name: Chat Showdown - A twitch streamer's game!
name_original: Chat Showdown - A twitch streamer's game!
description: This game is a streamer's new best app! Allows you to challenge another streamer in a chat showdown where your chats are represented by a castle. Next they can spam emotes in the chat such as Kappa, SMOrc, PogChamp and DansGame to shoot projectiles at the other casstle in order to destroy it. It's a brand new release so it doesn't look that good but will soon upgrade those too.
